item.title: WhatsApp Sender Pro 2018 3.5
item.description: Name : WhatsApp Sender Pro 2018 Version : 3.5 OS : Windows Type : Whatsapp Marketing Tools Price : $49 Homepage : SalePage Blast UNLIMITED message to Whatsapp users around the world. Whatsapp Blaster Brand new Desktop Application, was made especially to enable advertisers to send group, advertising and non- commercial advertising messages using WhatsApp which will allow user to send photos, videos. User will be able also to send a large number of characters as well so he would get the maximum possible benefit of the sending process.
item.yandex:full-text: Features Unlimited Sending : Send a WhatsApp Messages to thousands of your contacts. UNLIMITED NO Channel / Sender : It is the only solution can work with 1 channel or multi .. as you wish. Message Types, customize : Send All types of message ( Text / Image / Video / Audio / Location / Links ).. Update & Supprt : Yes It's Fully Supported and Regural Free Updates. Cost Effective : No need to buy Channels! Only 1 Normal Cell can work. No need for monthly subscription! One time payment. Personalized Inbox : Reply individually to all your channels. Personalized inbox for all incoming messages. Report : Once Campaign Accomplished, Export the results to Excel or Text Files a click away. Customizable Sender ID : Set your Sender ID, Avatar/Logo. With only 1 Click.
item.turbo:content:
Features


  • Unlimited Sending : Send a WhatsApp Messages to thousands of your contacts. UNLIMITED
  • NO Channel / Sender : It is the only solution can work with 1 channel or multi .. as you wish.
  • Message Types, customize : Send All types of message ( Text / Image / Video / Audio / Location / Links )..
  • Update & Supprt : Yes It's Fully Supported and Regural Free Updates.
  • Cost Effective : No need to buy Channels! Only 1 Normal Cell can work. No need for monthly subscription! One time payment.
  • Personalized Inbox : Reply individually to all your channels. Personalized inbox for all incoming messages.
  • Report : Once Campaign Accomplished, Export the results to Excel or Text Files a click away.
  • Customizable Sender ID : Set your Sender ID, Avatar/Logo. With only 1 Click.

item.title: WappBulk Contacts Filter 2018 v9.0.0.2
item.description: Name : WappBulk Contacts Filter & Last Seen 2018 Version : 9.0.0.2 OS : Windows Type : WhatsApp Marketing Tools Price : $150 Homepage : SalePage It can filter million of numbers in few minutes and show you active/inactive users list. This app can find active WhatsApp numbers and last a connect to WhatsApp (inbuild function of LastSeen).
item.yandex:full-text: Features It can filter WhatsApp contacts from a list of numbers. Let’s say you have 10 000 numbers and don’t know which one is on WhatsApp. So this app will do this for you. No limit on this app, it filters 40-50 contacts in 3-5 seconds.
item.turbo:content:
Features


It can filter WhatsApp contacts from a list of numbers. Let’s say you have 10 000 numbers and don’t know which one is on WhatsApp. So this app will do this for you. No limit on this app, it filters 40-50 contacts in 3-5 seconds.

Price: 50$ — support virtual numbers

item.title: MegaWhatsApp 2018 v4.0
item.description: Name : MegaWhatsApp Version : 2018 OS : Windows Type : WhatsApp Marketing Price : $0 Homepage : SalePage Everything you need to sell a lot using the world's largest known communication application WhatsApps is to successfully identify your ideal target audience and find it on Facebook, Export these contacts using our extraction tool, assemble a text spreading your product and send to this audience using our WhatsApp Bulk Upload Tool
item.yandex:full-text: Features With this Powerful Tool you will be able to send 3 to 7 Thousand messages a day to all your target audience. Think of a store any of these in a mall you usually visit, Usually you see in it 1 or at most 3 customers at the same time visiting the store or the shop window right? Now imagine this same store with 1, 2 or 3 thousand people at the same time seeing this same shop window. Did you? so ... this is what will happen with your website or virtual store. You can schedule your uploads, pause, send pictures, photos, videos links and all with real-time opening. With this 3 in 1 System you will be increasing sales and revenues of your store or product by up to 1,500%.
item.turbo:content:
Features



With this Powerful Tool you will be able to send 3 to 7 Thousand messages a day to all your target audience.

Think of a store any of these in a mall you usually visit, Usually you see in it 1 or at most 3 customers at the same time visiting the store or the shop window right?

Now imagine this same store with 1, 2 or 3 thousand people at the same time seeing this same shop window. Did you? so ... this is what will happen with your website or virtual store.

You can schedule your uploads, pause, send pictures, photos, videos links and all with real-time opening.

With this 3 in 1 System you will be increasing sales and revenues of your store or product by up to 1,500%.
